title: Implementing Odoo ERP for Company Management
description: This project involved implementing the Odoo ERP system for our company, focusing on streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency.

title: Java Quiz Application
description: An interactive Java application designed to test users' knowledge about Java through multiple-choice questions, providing immediate feedback and tracking results.

title: Data Mart for Employee Performance Tracking in a SME
description: A project to design and implement a data mart for tracking employee performance in an SME, applying theoretical knowledge from a Data Warehouse course.

title: Netflix Clone Project
description: This project aims to create a functional clone of Netflix, including category navigation, content search, and video playback, providing an immersive experience.

title: Machine Learning Project: Unveiling Data-Driven Insights
description: This project delves into descriptive data analysis to unveil crucial insights, guiding informed strategic decisions and effective actions.

title: Development of a Web Weather Application
description: A project to create a web-based weather application for Tunisia, completed as part of a Web Programming course.

title: Cobol Project: Hierarchical Management of Salary Data
description: A comprehensive COBOL program for managing salary data, including experience calculation, team count, leader identification, and anomaly handling.
